Definition.WordDefinition: methamphetamine n : amphetamine used in the form of a crystalline hydrochloride; used as a stimulant to the nervous system and as an appetite suppressant [syn: {methamphetamine hydrochloride}, {Methedrine}, {meth}, {deoxyephedrine}, {chalk}, {chicken feed}, {crank}, {glass}, {ice}, {shabu}, {trash}]
